text: my name is suavar savarsen and I work
for iag Tech International Airlines
group or iag as we're known as the
parent company for six different
airlines British Airways Aer Lingus
Iberia Iberia Express boiling and level
my role is in iag Tech which is a
group-wide technology function and what
we do is we work with across all of our
operating companies to find synergies
and cost savings and ways to support
each other and to support our employees
to make sure that they're delivering the
best service for our customers the cloud
training program at iig Tech is called
click which stands for Creative Learning
and Cloud knowledge and it's all based
around the AWS skills Guild program The
Click program within IIT Tech alongside
the AWS skills Guild has created a group
of Champions who go across the
organization and really encourage people
to engage at their own pace and find
things that really interest them this is
a a Grassroots movement where we're
getting everyone involved we have so
many great talented people who are who
are throughout the organization and it's
it's their insights and their ideas that
are going to really power power our
success and make this a success it's
been massively beneficial to my role to
have that community of people that I can
reach out to show them uh what we're
aiming to do what our priorities are
what our goals are for the future of the
organization and then show them how we
can invest in them how we can support
them and how they can be a part of the
transformation we've already trained 300
people we've have almost 2 000 people
attending our leadership sessions our AG
Tech has become quite a bit more
Innovative as a result of the training
from AWS skills Guild we're seeing lots
of really great innovation in particular
in our use of our data using that to get
insights and actionable intelligence
that we wouldn't have had otherwise
